input:
Please update the following program based on this instruction: Did you follow my instructions to do the following things? If not you need to do: Radius_I is the speed of the cube. When Radius_I changes to a new value, the speed of the cube also changes to that value.

Current program:
from vpython import *

# Parameter Settings
size = 0.2 # Size of the block
L = 2.0 # Length of the floor
v = 1.0 # Initial speed of the block
t = 0 # Start time
dt = 0.01 # Time interval

# Display Settings
scene = canvas(title="Uniform Linear Motion", width=600, height=600, x=0, y=0, center=vector(0, -0.05, 0), background=vector(0.5, 0.5, 0))
cube = box(pos=vector(-L/2+size/2, 0, 0), size=vector(size, size, size), color=color.blue)
floor = box(pos=vector(0, -size/2, 0), size=vector(L, size/10, size), color=color.yellow)

gd = graph(title="x-t Graph", x=600, y=0, width=600, height=300, xtitle="t(s)", ytitle="x(m)")
xt = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.red)

gd2 = graph(title="v-t Graph", x=600, y=300, width=600, height=300, xtitle="t(s)", ytitle="v(m/s)")
vt = gcurve(graph=gd2, color=color.red)

# Object Motion
while cube.pos.x <= 0.5*L - 0.5*size:
    rate(1000)
    cube.pos.x += v*dt
    xt.plot(pos=(t, cube.pos.x))
    vt.plot(pos=(t, v))
    t += dt

# Cyber Input Variable Mapping
Radius_I = 1
v = Radius_I
cube.v = vector(v, 0, 0)
output:
from vpython import *

# Parameter Settings
size = 0.2 # Size of the block
L = 2.0 # Length of the floor
t = 0 # Start time
dt = 0.01 # Time interval

# Display Settings
scene = canvas(title="Uniform Linear Motion", width=600, height=600, x=0, y=0, center=vector(0, -0.05, 0), background=vector(0.5, 0.5, 0))
cube = box(pos=vector(-L/2+size/2, 0, 0), size=vector(size, size, size), color=color.blue)
floor = box(pos=vector(0, -size/2, 0), size=vector(L, size/10, size), color=color.yellow)

gd = graph(title="x-t Graph", x=600, y=0, width=600, height=300, xtitle="t(s)", ytitle="x(m)")
xt = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.red)

gd2 = graph(title="v-t Graph", x=600, y=300, width=600, height=300, xtitle="t(s)", ytitle="v(m/s)")
vt = gcurve(graph=gd2, color=color.red)

# Cyber Input Variable Mapping
Radius_I = 1

# Object Motion
while cube.pos.x <= 0.5*L - 0.5*size:
    rate(1000)
    v = Radius_I # Update speed based on Radius_I
    cube.pos.x += v*dt
    xt.plot(pos=(t, cube.pos.x))
    vt.plot(pos=(t, v))
    t += dt
    Radius_I = cube.v.x # Update Radius_I based on cube's speed
